msg:
# presents a fortune
fortune

# presents an offensive fortune
fortune -o

# presents a long fortune
fortune -l

# presents a short fortune
fortune -s

# options can be combined
fortune -os

#Install fortune first!! 
sudo apt-get install fortune
#Tells you a fortune or mini-fact. Share it with your bros!  
fortune

#.... and if your'e not a pussy, install this:
sudo apt-get install fortunes-off   

#Now, get ready to greet your bro next time you see him:
fortune -o
